skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: relaxing meditation
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"Relaxing Meditation: Ten Minute Sessions" is an Alexa skill that offers guided meditations to help you relax whenever you need it. Each session lasts 10 minutes, featuring a variety of calming voices and soothing background sounds to promote relaxation for both body and mind.

♪ Premium Meditations include: ♪ 

• Meditations with different professional voices
• A variety of background sounds tailored for meditation
• Unlimited access to all sessions
• Continually updated meditation tracks

We’d love to hear your feedback to improve and provide the best guided meditation experience possible.

Enjoy your relaxation!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
